mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id, u.user_name, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id "seckillGoods.seckill_id", s.name "seckillGoods.name", s.number "seckillGoods.number", s.start_time "seckillGoods.start_time", s.end_time "seckillGoods.end_time", s.create_time "seckillGoods.create_time" from success_killed sk inner join seckill_goods s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id inner join user u on sk.user_id = u.user_id where sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId} and sk.user_id=#{userId}
